actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-122, by Mr. Dreier.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 219 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Making in order a motion to take the bill S. 219 from the Speaker's table, and to strike all after the enacting clause of the Senate bill, and insert the text of H.R. 450 as passed by the House.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 50.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 219) to improve the economy and efficiency of Federal Government operations by establishing a moratorium on regulatory rulemaking actions, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 219 (establishing a moratorium on Federal regulatory rulemaking actions).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 219) to improve the economy and efficiency of Federal Government operations by establishing a moratorium on regulatory rulemaking actions, and for other purposes.
